Articles.Content:
It seems that in .25 I cannon edit the mindistance variable for terrain loading, it just resets itself upon loading. Is there a way around this or do I have to just deal with lagsbane?

Edited October 8, 2014 by peachoftree
Never mind my ramblings:rolleyes:. I forgot to save my changes before the game loaded so sublime text was helpfully showing me the file "updates" made by the game. Mods please delete this thread.
Just to add an note, the update reset my graphic settings to default. I had to reset the screen display back to native 1680x1050 full screen and turn up the details.

I've already made a thread HERE.

I can't even play the game with this... I have too many settings that need to be changed. I would be very happy if someone can find a workaround or fix.

EDIT: And yes I "saved" the file...

Edited October 8, 2014 by RocketPilot573
